hero.headline: Host your dreams
hero.description: Hosty provides premium cloud infrastructure with enterprise-grade security. Deploy instantly, scale globally, sleep soundly.

why.headline: Why developers switch to
why.description: We don't just host your code; we optimize it. Experience the difference of a platform built by developers, for developers.

nvme.title: Blazing Fast NVMe
nvme.description: 100% NVMe storage architecture delivers up to 10x faster I/O performance than traditional SSD hosting.

security.title: Ironclad Security
security.description: Automated daily backups, free SSLs, and AI-driven DDoS protection keep your data safe 24/7.

cdn.title: Global CDN
cdn.description: Content is cached across 200+ edge locations worldwide, ensuring low latency for every user.

devtools.title: Developer Tools
devtools.description: SSH access, Git integration, WP-CLI, and staging environments come standard with every plan.

support.title: 24/7 Expert Support
support.description: No bots. Chat with real engineers who can help debug issues within minutes, not hours.

scalability.title: Scalable Infrastructure
scalability.description: Start small and scale up to huge clusters instantly without migrating data or downtime.

marketplace.headline: Deploy your favorite apps with 1-Click
marketplace.description: Forget complex server configurations. Hosty's marketplace lets you launch production-ready instances of popular software instantly.

network.description: Our ultra-low latency network spans 6 continents. Hosty automatically routes traffic to the nearest node, ensuring your site loads instantly from Tokyo to Toronto.

latency.title: Latency Optimization
latency.description: Smart routing cuts response times by 40%

cloudVps.name: Cloud VPS
cloudVps.description: Flexible virtual instances for developers and small apps. Scale instantly.

vdsHybrid.name: VDS Hybrid
vdsHybrid.description: Virtual Dedicated Servers with guaranteed resources and dedicated threads.

dedicated.name: Dedicated Server
dedicated.description: Single-tenant physical servers for maximum performance and control.

sarah.name: Sarah Jenkins
sarah.content: Switching to Hosty was the best decision we made this year. Our API response times dropped by 60% instantly.

david.name: David Chen
david.content: The developer experience is unmatched. The CLI tool makes deploying my Next.js apps feel like magic.

elena.name: Elena Rodriguez
elena.content: Client sites are faster, support is actually helpful, and the pricing is transparent. Highly recommended.

questions.question: How fast is Hosty compared to competitors?
questions.answer: Hosty uses enterprise-grade NVMe NVMe Gen4 storage and 10Gbps uplink ports, making us approximately 4x faster than standard SSD hosting providers like Godaddy or Bluehost.

questions.question: What types of hosting do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer shared web hosting, VPS servers, dedicated servers, cloud hosting, and WordPress hosting. All plans include free SSL certificates, daily backups, and 24/7 support to ensure your website runs smoothly.

questions.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all hosting plans. If you're not satisfied with our service, simply contact our support team within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.

questions.question: Do you provide a control panel?
questions.answer: Yes, all hosting plans include our intuitive control panel that makes it easy to manage domains, databases, email accounts, files, and more without any technical knowledge required.

questions.question: Do you offer free migration?
questions.answer: Yes! Our expert support team will migrate your existing websites from any other provider completely free of charge with zero downtime.

questions.question: Is my data backed up automatically?
questions.answer: Yes! We perform daily automated backups of all hosting accounts. Professional and Enterprise plans include 30-day backup retention with one-click restore functionality from your control panel.

questions.question: Where are your data centers located?
questions.answer: We have data centers in New York, London, Frankfurt, Singapore, and Sydney. You can choose your preferred location during checkout.

cta.title: Stop waiting. Start building
cta.subtitle: Join the new standard of cloud hosting. 30-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked.

footer.description: Hosty provides high-performance cloud infrastructure for developers who care about speed, uptime, and design.
